name: prospectpro-supabase-first
description: ProspectPro - Supabase-First Lead Discovery Platform with Edge Functions

scripts.build:static: mkdir -p dist && cp public/index-supabase.html dist/index.html && cp public/supabase-app.js dist/app.js
scripts.deploy:gcs: npm run build:static && gsutil -m rsync -r -d ./dist/ gs://prospectpro-static-frontend/
scripts.deploy:edge-functions: supabase functions deploy business-discovery && supabase functions deploy campaign-export
scripts.db:setup: echo 'Run SQL from /database/supabase-first-schema.sql in Supabase dashboard'
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ node_modules/ && echo 'Cleaned build artifacts'
scripts.archive:legacy: mkdir -p archive/legacy-server && mv server.js api/ modules/ docker/ archive/legacy-server/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Legacy files managed separately'
scripts.health: echo 'Use Edge Function endpoints for health checks'
scripts.test: echo 'Test Edge Functions via Supabase dashboard or curl'
scripts.debug:quick: echo 'Common issue: Check anon key sync between frontend and Supabase dashboard'
scripts.debug:edge-function: echo 'Test Edge Function: curl -X POST https://sriycekxdqnesdsgwiuc.supabase.co/functions/v1/business-discovery -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ANON_KEY" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"businessType\": \"test\", \"location\": \"test\"}"'

author: Alex Torelli
